column6: UAE-based NMC Group, together with its subsidiaries, provides professional private sector medical services. The group also owns businesses engaged in a range of areas, including trading, hospitality, pharmaceutical manufacturing, pharmacy chains, financial services, education, jewellery, advertising, real estate and information technology. NMC Group was founded in 1975 and is based in Abu Dhabi, UAE.

Alltech, an animal health and nutrition company, develops and manufactures natural feed supplements that improve animal performance. The company offers various dairy, beef, poultry, pig, equine, aquaculture, and pet animal health and nutrition products. It also provides natural-based products, technical information, and solutions for agronomic and horticultural issues for producers. In addition, the company produces ale products and beers; and provides education services, including graduate development programs for students. The company was founded in 1980, the company is headquartered in Nicholasville, Kentucky, US.
column36: Mark Lyons, president, "We needed the new markets and Nepal has such a booming market. So, we decided to open a country office here,"

column6: Route Mobile Limited is a global cloud communication platform service provider. Route Mobile Limited was formerly known as Routesms Solutions Limited and changed its name to Route Mobile Limited in March 2016. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Mumbai, India.
Midmark manufactures and supplies medical, dental, and animal health products. The company was founded in 1915 and is headquartered in Dayton, Ohio, US.

Al Danube Building Materials manufactures and supplies building materials for customers in Gulf Cooperation Council countries, Asia, and Africa. It offers MDF, plywood, boards, exotic timber, veneer, laminates, cladding, steel, kitchen, sanitary, glass, hardware, electrical, aluminium, doors, flooring, adhesives, tiles, ceiling, paints, edge banding, and fire solution products. The company also designs and manufactures doors for interior and exterior applications. In addition, it offers matched door frame and door architrave with matched coating services. Al Danube Building Materials was founded in 1993 and is based in Dubai, the United Arab Emirates.
SI-UK specialises in UK university selections for overseas students. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

CloudFlare provides solutions that protect and accelerate websites online. It offers the CloudFlare content delivery network, CloudFlare optimiser and CloudFlare security, as well as security protection services; and detects new attacks that arise against websites on its network. CloudFlare was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California, US.

AP Moller - Maersk is a shipping firm. It is active in ocean and inland freight transportation and associated services, such as supply chain management and port operation. The company was established in 1904 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

Doha Bank provides conventional commercial banking, Islamic banking, and insurance services to individual, commercial, corporate, and institutional clients. It offers various deposit products, including current, savings, call, green, upfront interest fixed deposit, term deposit, smart saver deposit, and fixed deposit accounts, as well as loans, such as personal, car, home, marriage, education, and rent loans. The company also provides treasury and investment services, and personal and commercial insurance. It was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Doha, Qatar.
